thread.title: Faisal Khan, Sanaya Irani or Shamita Shetty: Who won 'Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Reloaded'?
thread.title_full: Faisal Khan, Sanaya Irani or Shamita Shetty: Who won 'Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Reloaded'? | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Faisal Khan, Sanaya Irani or Shamita Shetty: Who won 'Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Reloaded'?
text:
Image Courtesy: Faisal Khan Twitter Profile According to media reports, Faisal Khan is named the winner of dance reality show Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Reloaded .
A picture from the sets of the show has been leaked on the social media in which Faisal is seen holding the winning cheque while his choreographer is seen holding the trophy.
Along with Faisal, TV actress Sanaya Irani and Bollywood actress Shamita Shetty were in the top three of Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Season 8. Faisal, the youngest of the lot, defeated the two and walked away with the trophy.
Faisal had also won Dance India Dance Li'l Masters in the past. His father is an auto rickshaw driver. He has also played the role of young Maharana Pratap in popular TV show "Bharat Ka Veer Putra - Maharana Pratap".
In the middle of the finale celebrations, former contestant Kavita Kaushik after being miffed walked out of the show mid-way. According to an entertainment portal, a team from Comedy Nights Bachao (CNB) was performing at JDJ finale and hosting a 'roast'. When CNB team made fun of her, she did not like it and hence walked out of the show.
The finale episode will also see Alia Bhatt promoting hre upcoming film Shaandaar with Shahid Kapoor, who is also a judge on JDJ Reloaded. Shahid also posted videos from the sets of the show.
Here come the #Shaandaar lady .
Posted by Shahid Kapoor on Wednesday, October 7, 2015
@aliaabhatt @laurengottlieb @ganeshhhegde finally behaving their age #shaandaardiaries . Insomnia .
Posted by Shahid Kapoor on Wednesday, October 7, 2015
Shamita Shetty's sister Shilpa Shetty will be seen cheering in the finale episode.
